value: ¿Por qué aplazaron la reunión?
Why did they postpone the meeting?
Escojan lo que les guste.
Choose whatever you like.
Copiad esto en el cuaderno; es importante.
Copy this in the notebook; it's important.
Vamos a despegar.
We are taking off.
Abróchense los cinturones!
Fasten your seatbelts!
El doctor le recibirá enseguida.
The doctor will see you at once.
No crucéis la calle con la luz en ámbar, niños!
Don't cross the street on orange light, kids!
Limpie la superficie con un paño humedo.
Clean the surface with a moist cloth.
Meta una moneda de un euro y espere unos segundos.
Put in a coin of one euro and wait for a few seconds.
Envíe su donativo a la siguiente dirección.
Send your donation to the following address.
No toques la base de la plancha mientras está encendida.
Do not touch the base of the iron while it is on.
Seque bien la blusa antes de planchar.
Dry the blouse well before ironing.
Frena un poco!
Brake a little!
¿Has fregado las tazas?
Have you washed the cups?
Yo regaré las rosas en tu ausencia.
I will water the roses while you're away.
Mida usted bien el espacio para el mueble antes de encargárnoslo.
Measure the space well for the furniture before ordering it from us.
Cierra ya el grifo, estás gastando mucha agua.
Close the tap already, you are spending a lot of water.
Si algo había que se le diera bien a Mary, era tratar de acabar órdenes.
If there was something that Mary did well, it was complying with the orders.
Tuerce por la segunda a la izquierda.
Turn to left from the second one.
Prueben estas gambas, señores!
Try these prawns, gentlemen!
Remueve la tierra antes de plantar el rosal.
Dig up the ground before planting the rose bush.
Pruébese este jersey, es de su talla.
Try this shirt on, it's your size.
We must leave at once or we miss the flight.
Tenemos que salir enseguida o perderemos el vuelo.
Ramiro ronca por la noche.
Ramiro snores at night.
Vi los glaciares con asombro.
I saw the glaciers with amazement.
La explosión hirió a varias personas, pero a ninguna de gravedad.
The explosion injured several people, but none of them seriously.
Me agrada que quieras estudiar Medicina.
I like that you want to study medicine.
Huele bien este caldo.
This soup smells good.
No quiero que digan que soy roñoso.
I don't want them to say that I'm stingy.
Si haces una pregunta atrevida, puede que la respuesta sea antipática.
If you ask a daring question, you might get an unpleasant answer.
Me enteraré de la verdad pase lo que pase.
I will find out the truth no matter what.
Son las medidas más fuertes que haya tomado Estados Unidos para responder a un ciberataque que se considera respaldado por un gobierno extranjero.
They are the strongest measures the United States has taken to respond to a cyberattack that is seen as backed by a foreign government.
Quisiera ver esos zapatos del escaparate, por favor.
I would like to see those shoes on the shop window, please.
Mi cuñada no fue amable con mis padres.
My sister-in-law was not kind to my parents.
Te ruego que me ayudes con este asunto.
I beg you to help me with this issue.
Unió los cables para que alcanzaran hasta el escenario.
She joined the cables so they reached the stage.
En los dos últimos años, la guerra ha desgarrado la ciudad.
In the last two years, the war has torn the city apart.

Civil conflict has served to make it the perfect place for mercenaries and the black market to hang the "open" sign.
Dejo que Barbie me azote porque soy una nena.
I let Barbie spank me because I'm a babe.

You're aware, huh?
Es imposible engañar a Tomás.
It's impossible to deceive Tomas.
Se ha roto dos costillas esquiando.
He has broken two ribs while skiing.

I'm sure Jose has the keys to the junk room.

Is the president going to resign?
Ana y Enrique riñen mucho.
Ana and Enrique argue a lot.

Stop annoying your brother and do your homework.
Andrés se portó bien ayer.
Andres behave well yesterday.

I'm not surprised that Carlota was losing weight.

I hate your self-healing entrails, kid!
Si quieres acabar con esa mancha tendrás que restregarla.
If you want to get rid of that stain, you'll have to rub it hard.
